text:
Ably | SDK developer | London head office | Remote (in Europe) | Full time

Ably is a global realtime data delivery platform that powers low-latency communication between internet-enabled devices. We solve the hardest parts of delivering the service reliably at scale so developers donâ€™t have to.

We have a number of SDKs in all popular languages (see http://www.ably.io/download), and a spec that all client libraries strictly adhere to (see https://docs.ably.io/client-lib-development-guide/features/). We are looking for polyglot engineer with a minimum of iOS, Android and Javascript experience to maintain and lead the development of our open source client libraries.

Find out more at http://jobs.ably.io/o/mobile-and-web-client-library-sdk-deve...
